CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Finance of America Companies Inc provides a diverse selection of lending products and services. Its products include home loans, reverse mortgages, commercial loans and lender services. Its operating segments include Mortgage Originations, Reverse Originations, Commercial Originations, Lender Services, and Portfolio Management.
